title: There's A High Reward For The Return Of This Dog
description:
Over the weekend, someone broke into an animal shelter in Atlanta and stole several dogs. Thankfully two of the dogs were found, and there is only one still missing.
But before we get into that, Tommy has an update to give you all about a popular exit on the road.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
